# Reading a data

Reading a tourism data:

```{python}
import pyreadr
df = pyreadr.read_r('synthetic data/WP9_S2_Tourism_synt.rds').popitem()[1]

```

## A beautiful dataframe

This section  rows of our data frame

```{python}
from itables import show, init_notebook_mode
import pandas as pd

# OKRES consist year and month
df["OKRES"] = df["OKRES"].astype(str)

# show internactive mode
init_notebook_mode(all_interactive=True)

# show df z filter and pagination

)
```
